title: Cold Blooded
body: Gold 3 to Silver 3, had a 3 game hot steak going in to placements, won first 5 (which is supposedly the most important) in a row. Lost 2 Won 1 and loss 2 again, all solo queue because i read duo lowers your mmr rewards. I was even getting matched with people with plat borders. You sure are cold blooded rito, not that i give a shit ill climb anyway. but i can see why theres alot of butthurt on the forums over it.
